rules_text:
As Soli Fortress enters, you may pay 1 life. If you don't, Soli Fortress enters tapped.
Satrapies you control have “{T}: Add {W}.”
flavor_text:
[i]“The sunbird seeks a new bower when its nest tears asunder. I am Hope, I have heard this city's pleas, and I will guide it to safety if all else falls.”
—Winged-Wit Parastu[/i]
